name: Rice & Stew
description: A classic dish featuring steamed rice served with a savory, slow-cooked beef stew.

name: Egusi Soup
description: A traditional Nigerian soup made with ground melon seeds, enriched with assorted meats and spices.

name: Okro Soup
description: A hearty soup made with fresh okra and tender chicken wings, seasoned to perfection.

name: Porridge Beans
description: A comforting dish of slow-cooked beans, enhanced with the rich flavor of black tiger shrimp.

name: Spaghetti with Sauce
description: A delicious serving of spaghetti topped with a hearty tomato-based sauce, perfect for a satisfying meal.

name: Jollof Rice
description: A West African favorite, this dish features rice cooked in a rich blend of tomatoes, peppers, and spices.

name: Chicken & Chips
description: Crispy fried chicken served with golden, crunchy fries, a perfect combination for a quick meal.

name: Burgers
description: Juicy beef patties layered with fresh toppings and a special sauce, all nestled in a soft bun.

name: Salad
description: A refreshing mix of fresh greens, vegetables, and a light dressing for a healthy meal option.

name: Meat Pie
description: A flaky pastry filled with seasoned minced meat and vegetables, baked to golden perfection.
